donor_name: GLOBAL FUND TO FIGHT AIDS, TUBERCULOSIS
outputs.output_descr: The project is for the implementation of the Global Fund Round 5 Malaria Grant. The objectives of the project are (i) to increase  the proportion of mother/caregivers who are able to identify early symptoms and signs of uncomplicated and severe malaria in children under 5 years and take them for treatment within 24 hours in 59 districts; (ii) to increase the proportion of malaria cases accurately detected and diagnosed according to national policy in 59 malarious districts; (iii) to increase the number of patients receiving correct treatment for uncomplicated and severe malaria according to national guidelines in 59 districts; and (iv) to monitor drug efficacy of artemether lumefantrine at 8 sentinel sites in the country

project_title: Make ACT available for treatment ZIM-509-G09-M
